Name: Ginger Cosmos
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve with straws.
Review: Warming ginger spice in a very cooling, fruity drink.
History: Created in 2003 by Massilimiliano Greco at Zander, London, England. 'Cosmos' is a reference to the botanical name for pineapple, Ananas comosus.
